questions.text: What party was Ivan Perez from?
questions.explanation:
Communist.

	Ivan Perez was the head of the California Agricultural Laborers' Association. He once ran for Governor as a Communist candidate.

questions.text: How many hours did the President give Kundu to give up their weapons?
questions.explanation:
36.

	Instead of giving up, more people were killed and three American soldiers who were guarding the airport were taken hostage.

questions.text: What temperature did CJ say Washington DC was going to be when they left?
questions.explanation:
18.

	CJ was announcing temperatures in Washington DC and California. It was 78 degrees in California.

questions.text: How long was CJ wearing the sky blue suit that got hit by fruit and vegetables?
questions.explanation:
41 minutes.

	The suit was a sky blue DKNY that got hit with avocados. CJ tried to bribe several people into going instead of her, even bribing the President into letting her stay behind.

Donna.

	Josh had Donna speak with him to see if Josh would be wasting his time.

questions.text: President to _____: "If you leave, I'll kill you."
questions.explanation:
Josh.

	Jean Paul was talking to the President when Josh and the others walked in. Josh was going to leave, but the President didn't want Jean Paul to talk anymore so he threatened Josh.

questions.text: Who told the President they didn't like the French kid?
questions.explanation:
Toby.

	They were in the Oval Office talking about the tax plan. When the President asked Toby about the tax plan, Toby told him he didn't like the French kid.

questions.text: Which snack did Will bring the writing staff?
questions.explanation:
Rice Krispie Treats.

	Will wanted the writing staff to like him since he was taking Sam's job.

questions.text: Did Toby refer to Andy as a mini-van?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Andy (in response to Toby): "I saw him first, girls."

True.

	According to Debby Fiderer, the man arguing with Andy slipped on the floor. His friend thought Toby hit him and Charlie hit the friend going after Toby. Both of them ended up in jail.
